title: Purpose
heading: Everything starts with a purpose.
content:
When talking about work, purpose is the reason for everything.

Purpose is what gives direction and aligns different efforts.

This is the 'why' that Simon Sinek brilliantly emphasizes.

Purpose is the reason to exist for any organization.

Only by having a clear purpose, teams can align themselves, progress can be defined and meaningful results can be measured.

Have a clear & relevant purpose and team members will surprise you with what they can achieve.
